thread.title: Kim Jong Un secretly met with China's Xi Jinping

title: Kim Jong Un secretly met with China's Xi Jinping
text:
Kim Jong Un secretly met with China's Xi Jinping Wednesday, March 28, 2018 - 02:10 
North Korean leader Kim Jong Un’s visit to China, countering what had been growing estrangement between the Cold War allies, is likely to bolster Pyongyang’s leverage going into a planned summit between Kim and U.S. President Donald Trump. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
